column4: Hello, a new ubuntu user.  I plugged my zip drive into my computer, It asked me what do you want to do, I clicked open in new window, but nothing happened. How do I mount a zip drive or find wherever it went?
anybody know what device a zip drive sits on?
no idean but type dmesg to see any kernel messages that might be generated by u pluggin in your zip drive
there is a message there about it.
